title: Entering a game freezes my whole laptop.
body:
For the past 3-4 days each time, after i enter a game around 1-3 mins in, everything freezes... not just the game but the whole laptop.. all I can do is shut it down by holding the power button.. I can play other games just fine, the problem only occurs when I enter a LoL game.
I tried Reinstalling and repairing the game.. but still nothing changed.. can anyone help please..
Thankfully my team have been able to remake the games after I disconnect but in one game we got firstblood and they were not able to... and I finally reconnected after a while and completed the game but the problem still hasn't stopped.. Help me please! 

Edit: The problem has been solved, the new windows 10 update including the xbox app was the cause of the problem. The solution is to open the xbox app -> go to settings -> Disable the "record and take screenshots using Game DVR" .

Thanks to Declined and Porocles for helping solve the issue!

replies.body:
Hey  hi im doku,

That sounds incredibly strange, and I have to admit this is the first time I've come across this particular type of bug.
While I have seen similar stuff before this one certainly is odd.

I have a hunch your computer have trouble rendering certain animations, causing it to 'freeze up', this could indicate outdated drivers.

So that's where I would start.

Another cause for this could be damaged files, in which case I would suggest running a repair.

I also have a few clarification questions:

* You say your computer freeze, but does that mean you can't use ctrl + alt + esc?
* No buggsplat
* No blue screen of death
* Which operating system are you using?
* Are you using third party software?

That should be it for now, looking forward to hearing back from you ˆ-ˆ

I am using windows 10

And I am not using any third party software 

For the past month I was able to play league freely without any trouble.. this only started on the 15th of August, and it's really frustrating.

By the way after re-installing the game I was able to play 1 game without problems.. but the in the next game it crashed again..

I'll be waiting for your reply, thanks in advance :]

Thanks for the assist, Declined!  This issue has been recurring over the last few days, and it may be a result of a recent Windows 10 update.  Specifically, the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)seems to be causing the game to freeze.  Disable it and try again in a custom game.  Let me know how that works for you!

> If you encounter players who have had a windows 10 update recently and losing fps, then tell them to

> Click All apps and open Xbox App.
> Go to settings > Game DVR and deactivate "Take screenshots using Game DVR".
